name: blueCAPE Official Website - Currently in upgrade process
body:
We are upgrading our website. We will be back soon. Thank you for your understanding.

If you need to contact us, please send an email to info [at] bluecape.com.pt, tweet to us @bluecapept or contact us through our land-line telephone number (+351) 219 755 345.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
